name: Submarine Adventure (BFLAT Interactive)
description:
Pacific Ocean, 650 miles South West of the Pitcarn Islands

A massive earthquake struck the area, and caused an enormous rupture in the ocean floor. A new trench was formed, which is now believed to be the deepest and darkest on Earth.

You decide to assemble a custom submersible, and descend to the bottom of the trench. You will be the first to discover the mysteries that lie beneath.

Controls: Left Mouse Button

Daniel Manoiu - Programming, Story, 3D Modeling, Sound and Music

Sage Fremont - Programming, UI, 2D Art, Game Design
